name: The Annuity Connection
tag_list: annuity, annuities, annuity-rates, annuity-information, retirement-planning, retirement-advice, retirement-plans
overview:
The Annuity Connection is an independently ran annuity marketplace and information resource on the web for learning about, comparing, and selecting annuities. Our mission is to seek out the very best annuities from the top rated carriers and give investors the expert resources necessary to make informed annuity purchases.

TheAnnuityConnection.com is a consumer focused and user friendly website. We aim to provide prospective annuity buyers and existing annuity owners a trusted source where they can get the critical information they need to make educated decisions about their retirement planning. The site also features various sources of information, such as a portal that keeps the consumer connected with the latest news and reports regarding annuities from all major publications and media across the United States.

Recent market developments and it’s effect on investors portfolios have prompted mature investors to reevaluate their retirement options. Many are concerned about how long they will have to work before they are able to retire. And those retired are now worried about the prospect of outliving their retirement nest eggs. The Annuity Connection addresses these concerns by providing retirees with predictable and sustainable retirement income that can last a lifetime.

The company is headquartered in Scottsdale, Arizona with an office in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. The Annuity Connection has recently experienced rapid expansion and continued growth. The Arizona office offers free retirement planning classes, helping those transitioning out of the working world into retirement, as well as those already retired who need to make sure they don’t outlive their money. The Annuity Connection is committed providing investors with the information they need to make the right choices about their retirement finances.

How to Make Your Retirement Accounts Last Longer
